en: "'Mr Dazley stood rooted to the spot. "'He had been hugged by a complete stranger. "'He also thought he had been called a muggle, whatever that was. "'He was rattled. "'He hurried to his car and set off home, "'hoping he was imagining things, "'which he had never hoped before, "'because he didn't approve of imagination.'
zh: 德思礼先⽣站在原地⼀动不动，仿佛⽣了根。他刚刚被⼀个完全陌⽣的⼈搂过。他还想到⾃⼰被称做“麻⽠”，不知这是什么意思。他⼼乱如麻，连忙朝⾃⼰的汽⻋跑去，开⻋回家。他希望这⼀切只是幻象，他从来没有幻想过什么，因为他根本不赞同幻想。
